ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL (use in CI to push images)

container_port.description: Container port exposed by the application

domain_name.description: FQDN to use for Route53/ACM (e.g., app.example.com). Required if enable_https=true.

enable_https.description: If true, create HTTPS listener and ACM cert (requires domain_name + hosted_zone_id). If false, HTTP only.

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path

hosted_zone_id.description: Route53 hosted zone id for domain_name. Required if enable_https=true.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming
